---
id: create-type
title: "Create type"
description: "Creates a new object type in the specified space using a JSON payload. The creation process is subject to rate limiting. The payload must include type details such as the name, icon, and layout. The endpoint then returns the full type data, ready to be used for creating objects."
sidebar_label: "Create type"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/api/2025-04-22/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new object type in the specified space using a JSON payload. The creation process is subject to rate limiting. The payload must include type details such as the name, icon, and layout. The endpoint then returns the full type data, ready to be used for creating objects.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"The version of the API to use","in":"header","name":"Anytype-Version","required":true,"schema":{"default":"2025-04-22","type":"string"}},{"description":"Space ID","in":"path","name":"space_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"icon":{"description":"The icon of the object","properties":{"color":{"description":"The color of the icon","enum":["grey","yellow","orange","red","pink","purple","blue","ice","teal","lime"],"example":"yellow","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["ColorGrey","ColorYellow","ColorOrange","ColorRed","ColorPink","ColorPurple","ColorBlue","ColorIce","ColorTeal","ColorLime"],"title":"object.Color"},"emoji":{"description":"The emoji of the icon","example":"ðŸ“„","type":"string"},"file":{"description":"The file of the icon","example":"http://127.0.0.1:31006/image/bafybeieptz5hvcy6txplcvphjbbh5yjc2zqhmihs3owkh5oab4ezauzqay","type":"string"},"format":{"description":"The type of the icon","enum":["emoji","file","icon"],"example":"emoji","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["IconFormatEmoji","IconFormatFile","IconFormatIcon"],"title":"object.IconFormat"},"name":{"description":"The name of the icon","example":"document","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"object.Icon"},"layout":{"description":"The layout of the type","example":"todo","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"The name of the type","example":"Page","type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object","title":"object.CreateTypeRequest"}}},"description":"Type to create","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
